AUTHOR: Maselkov
NAME: GuildWars2
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing this cog. Use `[p]key add` add to add your api key. You can set up new game build notifier using `[p]gamebuild`. - first set a channel using `[p]gamebuild channel`, then toggle it using `[p]gamebuild toggle on`. Make sure `[p]gamebuild globaltoggle` is enabled as well!
